Title: Prohibits the shipment of certain live animals by postal mail
Summary: Prohibits the shipment of certain live animals by postal mail into, within, or to points outside of the state of New York and provides for a civil penalty not to exceed one thousand dollars per violation.
LawCode: Add ยง382, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting the shipment of certain live animals by postal mail
